poem:
**Instant Karma**

A man dances  
in the tethered light of chaos,  
taunting walls of authority  
with bravado spun from anger.  
Among the bricks of discord,  
one finds its mark—  
a sharp summation  
of the unlearnt lesson;  
the earth reclaiming  
his arrogance, as solitary  
as the cell that now holds him.
